title: [COMPLETE] Scheduled Maintenance - Patch 5.21 - 29/10/2015
body: On 29/10/15, starting at 04:00 Sydney Time (17:00 UTC), ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 5.21. At 05:30 Sydney Time (18:30 UTC), the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded. We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 3 hours.

replies.body: When will ranked queues be back up? :c
